name: Pharmacy Management System
desc: Built with C# and .NET, this desktop app features a GUI for pharmacy management, secure OTP login, and robust database integration for inventory and sales tracking.

name: Hotel Management System
desc: Java-based GUI application for handling bookings and customer records using a lightweight text file database, showcasing core Java programming skills.

name: Student Management System
desc: A database-driven project managing student data with SQL. Supports online/offline databases and session handling for efficient academic data management.

name: BDNewsPaperScraper
desc: Python Scrapy project for automating news extraction from Bangladeshi websites. Efficient data structuring for analysis and integration.

name: Portfolio
desc: A responsive portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and jQuery, hosted on Netlify to showcase projects and skills with professional design.

name: Nitefeeder
desc: A multiplayer racing game built in Unreal Engine 5, featuring cryptocurrency integration for in-game transactions and rewards.
